description.narrative: Aden Field Office Programme Implementation to achieve strengthened political commitment to legislate, plan, budget to scale up access to safe drinking water, adequate sanitation and improved hygiene practices.,which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved and equitable use of safe drinking water, sanitation, with improved hygiene practices and healthy environments.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
